thread.title: Gurmeet Choudhary gets robbed in Thailand!
thread.title_full: Gurmeet Choudhary gets robbed in Thailand! - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Gurmeet Choudhary gets robbed in Thailand!
text:
Gurmeet Choudhary 
Last week, Gurmeet Choudhary travelled to Pattaya, Thailand, for an extended birthday celebration with wife Debina Bonnerjee. While the couple was shopping at a local market on the last day of their trip, Gurmeet's travel bag went missing.
He lost Rs 60,000 and a few personal belongings, including a pair of sunglasses worth R1 lakh. "I quickly blocked my credit and debit cards. Luckily, I had kept my passport in Debina's bag," Gurmeet tells us. He, however, couldn't make time to lodge a police complaint â€” he had to return to India that day.
